message.body: Wait a minute. Stuy is doing seussical??
You should come see it!! i haven't been involved at all so i can't make any claims about its quality but it should be a fun show!!
Haha I'm sure it will be great. When is it and how much?
It's this coming wednesday, thursday and friday! for non-stuy people it's $10 but you might be able to get a $7 stuy student ticket.
